Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj hit the winning runs for South Africa
Tabraiz Shamsi took four wickets for South Africa
Aiden Markram looked set for a century but fell just nine runs short
South Africa held their nerve to win with just a wicket to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan elected to bat after winning the toss in hot and sultry conditions
South Africa's regular skipper Temba Bavuma returned to lead the side
South Africa's Kagiso Rabada was unavailable due to a back spasm
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
The Men in Green were praised for maintaining an attacking approach despite challenges
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shaheen Shah Afridi ended an early flurry from Quinton de Kock (24)
Marco Jansen played a crucial cameo for South Africa, slamming 20 from 14 deliveries
Haris Rauf almost won it at the death for Pakistan, but Maharaj's flick to the backward square boundary secured the win
